headline: Martin Marietta price target lowered to $600 from $701 at Citi
summary: Citi lowered the firm’s price target on Martin Marietta (MLM) to $600 from $701 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. Citi updated estimates and top picks as part of a 2025 outlook for the homebuilding and building products group. The firm’s 2025 earnings estimates fell 3% on average, and are now below consensus for most producers. After housing starts, remodeling spend, and cement volumes fell in 2024, Citi expects a “very modest rebound year” in 2025, the analyst tells investors in a research
